content.p: Records and Information Management is part of the Information Compliance Team within the Registrar's Department. We are responsible for the following: Records Management Data Protection Freedom of Information The team is responsible for producing policies and guidance for ensuring University compliance with relevant legislation, including advising members of the public how to make requests for information under the Freedom of Information Act 2000 (FOI), the Environmental Information Regulations (EIR), or the UK General Data Protection Regulation (UK GDPR, GDPR). The Freedom of Information Act 2000 gives the public the right to access information held by public authorities (such as universities). Find out more about what information we publish and how we manage requests The General Data Protection Regulation gives individuals the right to access information held about them and to be informed how the information is used by the University. Request copies of your personal information Records Management is the efficient and systematic control of records throughout their lifecycle from creation to their end of life.
